value.message: Error caught in catch block is logged without context information (e.g., user ID, input parameters).
value.suggestion: Log additional context such as user ID and input parameters along with the error message and stack trace.

value.message: Permissions for fetching orders are controlled by passing user.id from client to getOrders API. This can lead to IDOR if backend does not verify resource ownership.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend getOrders API verifies that the requested user.id matches the authenticated user and does not rely solely on client-provided IDs.
